title: Beautiful boutique hotel, ideally located
text:
Hotel Therese is a small but perfectly formed boutique hotel ideally located in the centre of Paris. It is beautifully decorated and maintained, the attention to detail with the interior design and decor creates a warm and homely atmosphere in a uniquely Parisian way.
The rooms aren't huge but they are very nice and feature a comfortable bed and every mod con you could need is included. Not to mention a mini bar crammed with premium French wines and champagne.
In the salon they serve a free afternoon tea daily which is a nice touch and mirrors the friendly atmosphere of the staff who are available 24/7 and very welcoming and friendly.
I booked through Egencia which included an express breakfast, which is delightful and includes 2 freshly baked croissants and a hot drink of your choice. You can take this in the salon or even indulge in breakfast in bed at no extra cost.
Overall a great stay, you are a short walk from the Louvre, galleries La Fayette and the Champs Elysees and a taxi or metro ride away from many other sites.
I plan to book direct next time as I think it will be cheaper but this would now be my go to hotel in Paris and I'll definitely be back.
